price: 12. Markuu Rabbigaa u waxyooday malaa’igta: Anigu waa idin la jiraaye ee qalbi suga kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey. Waxaan ku tuuri argagax quluubta kuwa gaaloobay, ee ku dhufta luqumaha korkooda, kuna dhufta xubnaha far kasta oo ay leeyihiin3.
arabic: إِذۡ يُوحِي رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّي مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَٱضۡرِبُواْ فَوۡقَ ٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَٱضۡرِبُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَنَانٖ
footnotes: 3. Tani waxay ka dhacday dagaalka, ujeeddadana waa gooya qoorta, laakiin hadduu cadowga xidho canbuur bireedyo oo ay adkaato in qoorta la gooyo, markaa waxaa la goyn gacanta si uu u qaadi kari waayo hubka, sida seefta, waranka, qoriga, iwm. Sidoo kale foodaha waxaa loola jeedaa faraha gacmahooda iyo cagahooda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh yūḥī rabbuka ilā al-malāikati annī maʿakum fathabbitū alladhīna āmanū sa-ul'qī fī qulūbi alladhīna kafarū al-ruʿ'ba fa-iḍ'ribū fawqa al-aʿnāqi wa-iḍ'ribū min'hum kulla banānin
